thread.section_title: OLDIES.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OLDIES.com | oldies.com | 11 of 418
thread.title: Lin Hooper

author: Lin Hooper
title: Lin Hooper
text: I was very pleased with the service at Oldies.com. I got exactly what I wanted. The prices I paid were comparable to prices I had already paid at local discount stores in my area. I placed my order in the late afternoon on Thursday and recieved my package in US mail the following Thursday. I got exactly what I ordered and the DVD's were in excellent shape. I will be ordering more in the future!!
